name: Up is Left, Down is Right
name_original: Up is Left, Down is Right
description:
This is "Up is left and down is right"

A game where your Up and Left movements are joined together, and your Right and Down movements are Joined together.

Controls:

Esc: Exits the game

W: Up and Left

S: Down and Right

T: Restarts the level

R: returns the player to the main menu
